Package cams.posts.post_entities

Class Approval

java.lang.Object
cams.posts.post_entities.Message
cams.posts.post_entities.Approval
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Approval extends Message implements Serializable
Represents an approval message, extending Message and implementing Serializable. Holds information about whether a particular action or request is approved or rejected.
See Also:

    • displayContent

      public void displayContent()
      Displays the content of this approval or rejection message.

      Prints out the userID of the person in charge of approving or rejecting the post and whether the content is approved or rejected.

      Specified by:
      displayContent in class Message
